nodes.text: Verrack was a Mon Calamari captain who was one of the commanders of the rebel MC80A Home One Type Heavy Star Cruiser Home One during the Battle of Endor. At the battle, he sat to the right of Admiral Gial Ackbar and warned him that there were Imperial ships in Sector 47, which allowed the admiral to determine that the fleet had fallen into a trap. Verrack had yellow eyes and brown-mottled skin.
